img_text: Thankksgiving party Monday, November 19, our preschoolers and kindergarteners will be celebrating Thanksgiving together. We will be having a Thanksgiving feast! We thought it would be cute if the kids dressed up as and Indian or a Pilgrim. If your last name begins with the letters A-L your child will be an Indian. If your last name begins with the letters M-Z, your child will be a Pilgrim. We wil be making hats in class for our feast.
